name: Anthony SPRUILL, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA GENERAL ASSEMBLY and Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees
docket_number: Appeal No. 20 Middle District Appeal Docket 1999

parties: Anthony SPRUILL, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA GENERAL ASSEMBLY and Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees.

opinions.text:
JURISDICTIONAL REVIEW
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 22nd day of April, 1999, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
727 A.2d 569
Anthony SPRUILL, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA GENERAL ASSEMBLY and Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 22, 1999.
